xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.SimpleEditorTpl/@ThingTemplate/@event_type_grid/@buttons/@Button/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.cmpId?if_exists}_store');
store.insert(store.getCount(), new store.recordType({${data.newData?if_exists}}));
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224

sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button
@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.grid.SimpleEditorTpl/@ThingTemplate/@event_type_grid/@buttons/@Button1/@handler
sname
handler
Scode
#$@text#$@
var grid = Ext.getCmp('${data.cmpId?if_exists}');
var store = Ext.StoreMgr.get('${data.cmpId}_store');
var records  = Ext.xworker.util.getGridSelectedRows(grid);
var selModel = grid.getSelectionModel();
if(selModel.hasPrevious()){
    selModel.selectPrevious();
}else if(selModel.hasNext()){
    selModel.selectNext();
}
store.remove(records);
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224
